title: arrange team
body:
Howmany years need to wait to start play game?
Estimated time is 1.43 min, i wait 2 hours 49 minutes, and game not started... Please fix this

replies.body: i restart client and work in like 2 min waiting... Also i got one more problem, in game , i get small window and they say server is busy, and i dont have HP and mana bars on me, or i cant move... I press alt+ctr+delete close game and restart - and work but i lose creeps in game or die from another champion because i cant move.. that is hapens in new patch like 2 or 3 times... But this waiting to start game killing me i cant wait 2 hours to start gameplay

There should not be a wait time of almost 3 hours when queuing up for a match O.o

Is this the only time this has happened?  Have you tried to kick out of this, restart your client, and try it again?  What type of match were you trying to join that gave you such a long wait time?

Reply back and let me know!
